channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole around drain, 24th January
item.description:
Large pot hole my bus stop. Debris sprayed onto pavement. Danger to road users and pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 24th January
item.description:
There are lots of white household bags containing rubbish at the end of the road in bickley by the alley that takes you to springfield gardens . there is also an abandoned hire bike . I live behind the sheltered accommodation and we are plagued by foxes and the rubbish is encouraging them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highfield Road, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nearest house number 5, 24th January
item.description:
Another fly tip on gallon close se78sy this time a big pile of black refuse sacks on the pavement the foxs have opted so all over the pavement
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gallon Close, Charlton

item.title: Oil coming from Leegate site into Eltham Road, 24th January
item.description:
Oil is leaking from the Leegate site near the junction of Leyland Rd and Eltham Road. There is a string smell of oil and it is running into the gutters. There Quaggy is about 100 yards away so the pollution could easily go into the river.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eltham Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
